summary: Email correspondence from an Assistant United States Attorney to an unknown recipient regarding a potential lead on Ghislaine Maxwell. The email forwards information from the AUSA's brother, an NYPD Lieutenant, about a private security contact who claims to have information and documents regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of potential information and documents held by a private security contact.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of potential information and documents held by a private security contact.

persons.context: Author of the forwarded email, providing contact information for a potential lead regarding Epstein and Maxwell.

connections.description: Both are subjects of the potential information and documents held by a private security contact.
The AUSA is forwarding a lead about Maxwell to the FBI.

events.title: Lead forwarded regarding Epstein/Maxwell
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney forwards an email tip about a private security contact claiming to have information and documents on Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell to the FBI.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney received a tip about a potential lead regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The tip originated from the AUSA's brother, who is a Lieutenant in the NYPD, and concerns a former colleague working in private security.
The private security contact works for an unnamed individual(s) with homes in New York, Florida, and the Bahamas.
The contact claims to possess information and documents related to Epstein and Maxwell, though the specific content is unknown.
The AUSA states they will pass the lead on to the FBI for follow-up.
